posts.post_title: for sale: T204 Knight (NY AL) - SGC Auth
posts.post_content:
[S]For sale[/S]: T204 Jack Knight (NY AL), SGC Auth. - sold.  Looking at this card, I still don't see the problem - it's not obviously trimmed or recolored.  It measures correctly.  :confused:

Any form of payment including PayPal is okay.  [URL="bill@t207.com"]Contact me[/URL] if interested.  Thanks.


Bill
